name: Elf
description: Created by the god Corellon, the first elves could change their forms at will. They lost this ability when Corellon cursed them for plotting with the deity Lolth, who tried and failed to usurp Corellon's dominion.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have Darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

traits.name: Elven Lineage
traits.description: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. Choose a lineage from the Elven Lineages table. You gain the level 1 benefit of that lineage. When you reach character levels 3 and 5, you learn a higher-level spell, as shown on the table. You always have that spell prepared. You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in that way when you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the spells you cast with this trait (choose the ability when you select the lineage).

drow.level_1: The range of your Darkvision increases to 120 feet. You also know the Dancing Lights cantrip.

high_elf.level_1: You know the Prestidigitation cantrip. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can replace that cantrip with a different cantrip from the Wizard spell list.
high_elf.cantrip_flexibility: can replace with Wizard cantrip on Long Rest

wood_elf.level_1: Your Speed increases to 35 feet. You also know the Druidcraft cantrip.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Charmed condition.

saving_throw_advantages: to avoid or end Charmed condition

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Insight, Perception, or Survival skill.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: You don't need to sleep, and magic can't put you to sleep. You can finish a Long Rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in a trancelike meditation, during which you retain consciousness.
